responses.title: Heed me, and it will go better for you.
Sa nith icha gluth. (This land will be consumed.)
This time it is the demon who will do the summoning!
I will scatter all who gather here today.
Ozh domosh acha. (My reign begins now.)
First blood. Ah ha ha ha ha.
With this blood I seal my promise of Dominion!
It is all one to me.
Hollom icha fek ozh. (Nothing can stop me.)
Izh vo'acha ses. (You can not hide.)
Ozh icha tak izh! (I will have you.)
Izh vo'acha nesh. (You are not safe.)
Ozh acha doq izh. (I am upon you.)
Good has no hold on you!
Your friends can't help you now.
My shadow does that to people.
In the end, you're all mine.
Ahm'irush tak izh. (The plague has you.)

name: Failing To Place Soul Catcher On An Enemy Hero

responses.title: It all comes together in the end.
Muwahha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Rahh, ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Your soul will make a fine minion!
Slain you say? I hardly noticed.
Cry for all the good it does you!
Did you not see the demon in your gaze?
Look to the shadows for a taste of your fate.
The weeping is yours, the laughter is all mine. Ha ha ha ha ha!
Izh sol fek. (Your day is over.)
Vo'sol izh. (There is no hope for you.)
My shadow rises while your shadow falls.
Whatever hell you came from will have to take you back.
The nightmares you harvest are like sweet dreams to me.
You might be a power in the underscape, but here, you're a damp spark.
The demon that made Clinkz botched the job if you ask me.
I'll never come to your call.
Warlock, you should have written your memoir, not your grimoire.
Omniknight, you were wholly a nuisance.
There lies Chen. Never were followers more misguided.
Ozh icha tak lash. (I will take my share.)
Izh greesh vo'lieyev. (Your debt is not yet paid.)
Ahm'vo'izh fek sa chron, Lucifash. (Not even you can stop me, Lucifer.)
Izh vo'poz doq nith, Lucifash. (You are powerless here, Lucifer.)
Ozh vo'chron izh rast, Lucifash. (I am no longer your puppet, Lucifer.)
The field is rife with enemies.
That's it: You're out of the cult.
Omoz groth ozh. (The abyss welcomes me.)
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ozh poz icha gluth wroth. (My power will rise again.)
Give me a moment to regroup.
I need more shadows here, to beat back this scouring light!
Who toys with demons will find himself toyed with.
I sense uncertain mastery of these most sinister arts…
I'll bite this hand that feeds me, and take it for my own!
I heard the cabal call my name.
This will further the Second Domination.
Oh, shadows, I shall use this in your name.
Ah, this dagger brings back memories.
I can wait a bit longer.
Wu-ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
A blinding light dispels my shadow!
All creation swept into my shadow!
Here is to a reign unending.
All the quicker to extend my reach.
And they thought it could get no darker.
In my shadow all is hidden.
Ozh icha tak lash. (I will take my share.)

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: No demon lord has ever been more assured that this one, is in the bag.
No demon lord has ever been more assured that this one, is in the bag!
Hm ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Buw ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Ah! Ha ha ha ha ha ha ah ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.
